attributes.action: Request that David Cameron withdraws his resignation.
attributes.background: Leave do not have a vision regarding the future relationship with the EU.  They do not have experience in how the EU works or relationships with the EU leaders.  The EU leaders will also see them as the enemy.  David Cameron is highly respected with negociating experience and positive relationships.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
